author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-5897, LUCENE-5400: JFlex-based tokenizers StandardTokenizer and UAX29URLEmailTokenizer tokenize extremely slowly over long sequences of text partially matching certain grammar rules.  The scanner default buffer size was reduced, and scanner buffer growth was disabled, resulting in much, much faster tokenization for these text sequences. (merged branch_4x r1619773)

author: ggregory
msg: [CSV-131] Save positions of records to enable random access. 2nd commit for this new feature. Let the Lexer make the underlying reader's character position available through a new package private method.

author: ggregory
msg: [CSV-131] Save positions of records to enable random access. First commit for this new feature. Let the ExtendedBufferedReader track how many characters it has read so far.

msg: updated scores for revision 1625221 active rules added since last mass-check
